Uses of Interface
imagingbook.pub.geometry.basic.Point

  • Packages that use Point 
    Package Description
    imagingbook.lib.image  
    imagingbook.pub.corners  
    imagingbook.pub.geometry.basic
    This package contains basic definitions for 2D geometry.
    imagingbook.pub.geometry.delaunay
    This package contains implementation of the Delaunay triangulation in 2D.
    imagingbook.pub.geometry.delaunay.chew
    Implementation of the incremental triangulation algorithm proposed by Paul Chew.
    imagingbook.pub.geometry.delaunay.guibas
    Implementation of the randomized incremental algorithm described in Guibas, Knuth, Sharir, "Randomized incremental construction of Delaunay and Voronoi diagrams", Algorithmica, no.
    imagingbook.pub.geometry.fitting  
    imagingbook.pub.geometry.mappings  
    imagingbook.pub.geometry.mappings.linear  
    imagingbook.pub.geometry.mappings.nonlinear  
    imagingbook.pub.lucaskanade
